message.original: 海はやっぱいいモンですね 小せぇ不安とか、どうでもよくなりますよ
message.translation: "Seeing the ocean is great feeling. It calms the mind."

message.original: 灯台の上までいってみちゃどうです 結構遠くまで見渡せそうですぜ
message.translation: "How about going to the top of the lighthouse? It looks faraway."

message.original: 漂流船ってなぁ、どこから流れて くるんでしょうね 港洞の洋撃船でもねぇようですし
message.translation: "Where do these drifting ships come from? Must be from a Harbor in the west."

message.original: 海岸は見通しがききますねぇ 谷以外はそれほど視界を遮るモンも ありませんし
message.translation: "We have a good view of the coast from here."

message.original: 南の浜はリンドブルムやら 厄介なヤツも出るようです ローテス側たぁえらい差ですねぇ
message.translation: "The southern coast seems to have something dire there unlike Rothes which makes a big difference."
